N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 218-2.4 - Research authorization

State Regulations

The commissioner may issue an authorization for the
research into motor vehicle emissions control devices including the testing of
experimental or prototype on-road motor vehicle pollution control devices. Applications for such authorization shall include, but not be limited to, a
description of the proposed modification(s), a description of the proposed
testing procedures, vehicle identification information, and the disposition of
the vehicle at the conclusion of testing, and will be subject to the same
application and testing requirements as set forth in California Health and

Safety Code section 43014 (see Table 1, section
200.9
of this Title) in addition to
the other requirements of this Part. Such research authorization may be issued
for up to one year, with the possibility for a single one year extension. Any
such research authorization will include such conditions and reporting as
deemed appropriate by the department. Failure to meet the terms of the research
authorization will subject an applicant to all applicable
penalties. Notes
